page.title: 11LEISURE-WOMEN AND CHILDREN
page.content:
Village organisations offering leisure activities for women and children include{Merton Youth Club}, {Merton Keep-Fit Club}and{Merton {Women's Institute}.
Almost 50 local children meet each week in the{Parish Hall}as the {Merton {Youth Club}for a varied programme of activities run by adult volunters.For outdoor activities they use the field and playground at{The Clinton School}.
{Merton Keep-Fit Club}is a group of local women who meet weekly in the{ {Parish Hall}to exercise to music.
The 25 members of{Merton W.I.}meet monthly in the{Parish Hall}when they consider subjects varying from cookery to mechanics.They value membership of an influential national organisation.
